title: Can Graves apply on hit affects for each bullet hit?
body:
Does anyone know?

I was just thinking that {{item:3071}} might be a little strong on him if he's able to potentially get max stacks from 1 crit.
Plus any other on hit item may be strong on him.

replies.body: From what I understand about how his basic attacks work, multiple bullets hitting the same target apply "collective" damage. For example, if each bullet dealt 150 damage and 3 hit the same target it would be a collective 450 damage, instead of 3 hits of 150 damage, and only apply one stack of "Rage" (Black Cleaver passive). Mind you, I haven't looked into that particular part of his kit.

Ehhh....  Black Cleaver isn't an on-hit
ALL Physical damage applies Black Cleaver stacks... which also includes things like Darius Bleed (which is physical damage)... which is why Black Cleaver is so core on Darius
As I read, yeah his bullets apply on hit effects. And you think that might be too strong on him? Mate he's so broken right now that's the least of your worries.
